Tungsten.Firewall is a minimal library, using NetFwTypeLib, to add and remove Windows firewall rules

4.15.2017 - v1.0.2
Changed static class W.Firewall.Firewall to W.Firewall.Rules
Changed the method names to reflect the class name change (now Add, Remove and Exists)

4.15.2017 - v1.0.1
Corrected the namespace

4.15.2017 - v1.0.0
Initial Release

Thanks for using Tungsten.Firewall,

Jordan Duerksen
